I fix all the errors by move all dependent heritrix jars from webapp lib in=
to jdk/ext/lib because tomcat first load jars from ext.
Now i got another p=
roblem, crawler start and finishes almost in the same time, crawl.log is no=
t empty but crawl status is notCrawled.

Any ideas ?



___________________=
_____________
 From: Manuel B <manuelbg36@...>
To: "archive-crawler@y=
ahoogroups.com" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Monday, May 6, 201=
3 12:24 PM
Subject: Re: SV: [archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.
 


=
=C2=A0 
Yes, Heritrix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementatio=
n.
Is there a way to override tomcats httpclient in this case, or should i =
run heritrix on another server to avoid conflict?
When i put patched httpCl=
ient in tomcat common lib dir i get DNS error, when its in webapp lib dir i=
 get nosuchmethoderror(setCookieMap).



________________________________

roups.com" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com>

Heritrix com=
es with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation as far as I remember. S=
o running inside a tomcat you might have conflicting libs ?

best
Bjarne An=
dersen
